tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
****** ******* ** *** ** *** ****** *** **** ************** ** **** ****.

Being pregnant during the pandemic was quite stressful, however all my visits with her have been quite smooth and safe , she was also available online whenever required which helped me with my anxiety 

I felt more relaxed during my visits as Her knowledge and experience was evident from the way she treated .her tips and advices helped a lot  to alleviate any  discomforts I had faced with minimal medication

And most of all she was there by my side in the middle of the night for delivery giving me strength and support

Glad to have her as my gynecologist üòäüôèüôè

review:
As per my wife experience. They told this is my second delivery c section Dr. Caring and detailed explanation given to my wife and in operation time also fully careful doing.

Final my wife fully satisfied.

******** ** **** ***** **** ******** ***** ** ** ***** some genetics issues during pregnancy was explained to her, no proper response. The screening was delayed for 3 weeks.,which real panicked is in the last moment  *** ** ***** ******* ** *** ********** We have to rush to other hospital to get treatment.
reply_text: I was down with covid August last week may be that was the reason for lack of communication

Dr.Madhavi is very Friendly and handles with care I refer Dr.Madhavi for all the Pregnant Issues and Gynic Problems

review: It's great satisfaction madam has deely examine the position of patient the. She intimate the treatment.I stronglyrecommend dr.madhavi garu for this.
I am very much happy with the treatment,she explains everything and gives her time properly..........
****** *** ***** only the issue is wait time is ver high even I have booked appointment in practo... disappointed with that...
